1016364381574127616.text: We will be migrating to the new REP token today. The current token will be removed from Radar just before the token freeze at 11:01 AM PT and the new token will be added once the migration is complete. No action is required from our users thanks to #wallettowallet trading.

1014554472192724993.text: We’ve recently become aware of a fake Radar Relay app on the google play store that asks for your private key. We currently do not have an app and we will NEVER ask for private keys or seed phrases.

950804074198327297.text: Our sudden increase in volume and traffic combined with a google cloud update have introduced instability in our kubernetes infrastructure. There will be downtime on our app as we work on a fix. Thank you for remaining patient, we will update you all as we go.
